p.d: We have an appointment with Émilie Broussouloux in Albi, Episcopal city in the Tarn and Unesco world heritage site since 2010. On the programme: discovering the hidden treasures of the Sainte-Cécile cathedral, the work of artists with a multitude of skills, and a motorbike racing challenge with Alexis Masbou. Presented by: Émilie Broussouloux.
